description: The user has entered the simulation suite. Within they can command a powerful computer to simulate any reality that they wish.
intro: You have entered the simulation suite. No simulation is currently active and you are in a non-descript space with paneled walls surrounding you. The control panel next to you is pulsating with a green light, indicating readiness to receive a prompt to start the simulation.
name: Simulation Suite V2
title: The Simulation Suite
help:
While there is not simulation active you can chat with the computer normally.

Once a simulation is active, address the computer by starting your statements with 'Computer, ' followed by an instruction.

Examples:
'Computer, i would like to experience an adventure on a derelict space station'
'Computer, add an alien creature to the environment.'
